data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Farm Strips Vol 4: North England Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Return to grassroots flying in the UK with Farm Strips Vol 4: North England. This scenery pack is a collection of 27 airstrips, recreating the small airfields often used by microlights and ultralights across North England.

Located in rural locations and often in or surrounded by farm fields, the airstrips in Farm Strips Vol 4 include ground textures and scenic models galore! The facilities available at each of the strips vary; some offer refueling, custom object detail, or simply a view over crops or cattle.

Farm Strips Vol 4: North England includes airstrips in Cumbria, Cheshire, Yorkshire and Lancashire – this is the perfect introduction to small time flying in the UK!

As an added bonus, also included is the CFM Streak Shadow along with 7 liveries, ideal for exploring the countryside from above!

Features:

  • 27 farm strips located in the North of England.
  • CFM Streak Shadow included with 7 liveries
  • Includes flight plans for flights between the farm strips
  • Unique models
  • Sounds effects around the farm strips
  • Custom effects to bring life into the airstrips
  • Ideal for use with Just Flight’s VFR Real Scenery Vol. 4 (Northern England):

    http://store.steampowered.com/app/320986]

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.
